articles.description: Cryptocurrency has skyrocket in value and this month alone, we saw the sale of $30 million worth of NVIDIA CMP series mining cards to the Hut 8 Mining Corp. and the seizure of 300 stolen NVIDIA CMP 30HX cryptocurrency mining cards. Now, Bitmain has just tease…
